sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE162030 AA WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD = 'Y0140000' /* 국세청 */ AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM PDF_J301Y BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR=AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD=AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=AA.SYSTEMKEY )
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE162030 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_ACC_NO , TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_SVNG_CL , JNNG_DT , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_FNN_CMP , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_PYM_AMT , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_INC_DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) (SELECT AC02.DPOB_CD , AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AC02.SYSTEMKEY , AC03.HOME_SEIL_SUM ,'Y0140000' /* 국세청 */ , AC03.SAVING_GUBN , AC03.REG_DT , AC03.COM_CD , AC03.TRADE_NM , AC03.HOME_AMT_SUM , 0 , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM YE161030 AC02, ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.RESID , AA.HOME_SEIL_SUM , DECODE(AA.SAVING_GUBN,'1','Y0040050',(DECODE(AA.SAVING_GUBN,'2','Y0040060','Y0040080'))) AS SAVING_GUBN , AA.REG_DT , AA.COM_CD , AA.TRADE_NM , AA.HOME_AMT_SUM FROM PDF_J301Y AA WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AA.PDF_DAT_APP_YN = 'Y' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM YE161030 AC01 WHERE AC01.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AC01.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND AC01.FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD = 'A0190001' ) ) AC03 WHERE AC02.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AC02.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AC02.DPOB_CD = AC03.DPOB_CD AND AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AC03.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AC03.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC02.SYSTEMKEY = AC03.SYSTEMKEY AND AC02.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = AC03.RESID )
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_ACC_NO , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_SVNG_CL , JNNG_DT , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_FNN_CMP , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_PYM_AMT , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_INC_DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE162030 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_ACC_NO DESC
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE162030 SET HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_INC_DDC_AMT = #hsngPrptSvngIncDdcAmt# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_ACC_NO=#hsngPrptSvngAccNo#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE162030 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_ACC_NO , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_SVNG_CL , JNNG_DT , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_FNN_CMP , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_PYM_AMT , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_INC_DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #hsngPrptSvngAccNo# , #hsngPrptSvngSvngCl# , #jnngDt# , #hsngPrptSvngFnnOrgnCd# , #hsngPrptSvngFnnCmp# , #hsngPrptSvngPymAmt# , #hsngPrptSvngIncDdcAmt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE162030 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_ACC_NO=#hsngPrptSvngAccNo# , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_SVNG_CL=#hsngPrptSvngSvngCl# , JNNG_DT=#jnngDt# , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD=#hsngPrptSvngFnnOrgnCd# , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_FNN_CMP=#hsngPrptSvngFnnCmp# , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_PYM_AMT=#hsngPrptSvngPymAmt# , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_INC_DDC_AMT=#hsngPrptSvngIncDdcAmt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_ACC_NO=#hsngPrptSvngAccNo#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE162030 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_ACC_NO=#hsngPrptSvngAccNo#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_ACC_NO , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_SVNG_CL , JNNG_DT , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_FNN_CMP , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_PYM_AMT , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_INC_DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE162030 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_ACC_NO=#hsngPrptSvngAccNo#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_ACC_NO , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_SVNG_CL , JNNG_DT , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_FNN_CMP , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_PYM_AMT , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_INC_DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE162030 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , HSNG_PRPT_SVNG_ACC_NO DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE162030 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
